Jimmy John’s Online Job Application For Employment
Author: Job Application Guy Category: Sandwich Shop Jobs Tags: Fast Food Jobs , jimmy johns , job application , online job application
Thursday Jul 8, 2010
Jimmy John’s is one of the fastest growing restaurants in the nation, and is expanding by leaps and bounds, growing to the ranks of other sandwich shops like Subway. There are many different opportunities for advancement, from making sandwiches, to delivery and distributions. There are even franchises for those who have some kind of background managing these kinds of restaurants. 95% of all the 1,000 different shops are franchise owned, with Jimmy John Liautaud owning 67% of the company.
If you want to work at a fast paced, family run business, then working at a Jimmy John’s offers the perfect opportunity, With this sandwich shop, while fast paced, they really understand what working at a fast food restaurant is all about, and focus not only on customer, but employee satisfaction as well. There are many different positions available, and they also offer a benefits package with food discounts, and many other incentives. You can find out more information on positions available, store locations, and what all this company has to offer by going online. They have a friendly website, and have the online job application right there waiting for you.
Have Questions Or Tips On Jimmy John’s Applications And Jobs. Leave A Comment Below For Our Community To Answer Or Use!
